title: How Are You So Beautiful
description:
First the seed goes down into the ground
Down and dies
Out of sight out of mind
Ain't no point in asking how or why
Somethings happen man 
Cant explain the circumstance
Synchronicity waters the seed and now you have a plant 
And if God wanted all the unknown to be clear
He'd wave a magic wand so that you could see it clear
But that would too easy man you dont understand
This story's got some twists and turns he likes it like that
They say your pain can be reduced to biochemistry 
Their theory of everything 
Forgot to factor destiny
From the darkness and the unknown
God spoke behold
Here you are baby boy and look how you have grown
Things change
Each day
And Don't stay the same
Embrace the pain
Make way for God's grace
It's okay you don't gotta have this figured out boy
All you gotta do is learn how to enjoy the ride


Cuz If it's all just random
And there's no such thing as magic
And there is no soul or spirit just molecules and atoms
How are you so beautiful
How are you so beautiful
If there's a simple explanation
And there is no great creator
And all we do can be reduced to animal behavior
How are you so beautiful
How are you so beautiful

What I'm looking for I don't think imma find In a book
God is all around us dude but we forget to look
All I need is good soil and sunshine
Some water and The right vibe
Let my leaves reach to the sky
the rest just takes time
This little light of mine I just gotta let it shine
Keep trying to remind em that God resides inside
And give grace, And be kind
Don't fly off the handle all the time
Cuz you don't know what's going on in someone elses life
And you are not a kog in a machine
You are something God has dreamed
Look not to what is seen
Trust the light your following
And trust the process
Cuz in this world of objects
It's all an illusion leading you to something constant
And people like to say the world is only the material
Oh yee of little faith 
why you overthinking it
You are just actor in the story God is writing
You don't get to choose what happens that's what makes this thing exciting

Cuz If it's all just random
And there's no such thing as magic
And there is no soul or spirit just molecules and atoms
How are you so beautiful
How are you so beautiful
If there's a simple explanation
And there is no great creator
And all we do can be reduced to animal behavior
How are you so beautiful
How are you so beautiful
